--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Shimazu Masayoshi" <patriot014@h...> 
wrote:
> More information on our old pal with the band-aid:
> 
> --Entered Okada Juusuke Toshisada's Shintou Munen Ryu dojo, the
> "Gekikenkan", at age 8. The dojo was located in Kanda Sarugaku-cho
> (district). At age 18 he reached mokuroku (6th dan), and at age 22, 
he
> received the menkyo kaiden certification.
> 
> --At age 19 he left the service of the Matsumae clan in order to
> travel and improve his technique.
> 
> --Spent time at Yurimoto Shuuzou's Shintou Munen Ryu dojo.
> 
> --Spent time at Tsubouchi Shume's Shingyoto Ryu dojo, where he met
> Shimada Kai, the future vice-commander of the Shinsengumi 2nd unit.
> 
> -- Later started "taking his meals" (a la Sano), at Kondou Isami's
> Shieikan, where he eventually studied for a time.
> 
> More soon.
> 
> --M.

wow so much information i didn't know about Nagakura-san! gahh im soo 
happy i found this place im loving alll of this information!
